allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: use word boundary regex for tech timeline validation

Substring matching \(.includes\(\)\) caused false positives where "rag"
matched words like "storage" and "coverage", triggering incorrect
anachronism warnings on nearly every resume. Replace with \\b word
boundary regex for all TECH_TIMELINE keywords.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git rebase --root --exec 'git commit --amend -m ""$\(git log --format=%B -n1 | sed ""/^Co-Authored-By:/d"" | sed ""/^$/N;/^\\n$/d""\)""')
